mapper.select:
<select id="foodReviewList" parameterType="review" resultType="review"> <![CDATA[ select review_no, review_contents, review_score, client_no, order_no, review_name, to_char(review_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') as review_date, dosirak_no, dosirak_name, food_img1, food_img2, food_img3, food_img4, food_img5 FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(review review_pk) */ rownum as rnum, review_no, review_contents, review_name, review_score, review_date, r.client_no as client_no, r.order_no as order_no, d.dosirak_no as dosirak_no, d.dosirak_name as dosirak_name, d.food_img1 as food_img1, d.food_img2 as food_img2, d.food_img3 as food_img3, d.food_img4 as food_img4, d.food_img5 as food_img5 FROM review r JOIN orders o on r.order_no=o.order_no join order_detail od on o.order_no=od.order_no join dosirak d on d.dosirak_no=od.dosirak_no join payment p on p.order_no=o.order_no join client c on c.client_no=o.client_no where
client_no = #{client_no} and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) reviewList WHERE rnum >(#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
SELECT review_no, review_contents, review_score, client_no, review_name, to_char(review_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') as review_date FROM review WHERE review_no = ${review_no}
